org.ramonbrand.civilization.world

Class WorldMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ramonbrand.civilization.world.WorldMap

  • public class WorldMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores a world map in a hashmap, which is accessable in constant time, irrespect of size.

      • getTileFromMap

        public WorldTile getTileFromMap(Vec2i tilePosition)
        Returns:
        Returns the tile from the world tile map which has the given coordinates.

      • setTileToMap

        Sets the tile in the world tile map to the tile specified at the given coordinates.

      • getAreasFromMap

        public java.util.Set<WorldArea> getAreasFromMap(Vec2i areaSectionPosition)
        Gets all the areas in section and returns them in the form of a Set. The method simply gets all areas which have been added to the specifc section position earlier. Choosing a section will be up to the area creation method.
